name: Slime Farmer: War of Rancher
description:
Slime Farmer: War of Rancher is a action game in the beautiful wood location about daredevil slimes that that got involved in war with slimes of rancher. You are the rancher and you have a lot of different types of slimes. You need to create a super army to beat others slimes of another rancher that has attacked your lands. Create you own army, be a hero! Get ready for crazy idle clicker gameplay experience! Slime Farmer: War of Rancher is for daredevil adrenaline slime fans.

Be like a rambo in world of slimes. Have fun!


Features:
Awesome gameplay
Awesome graphics
Awesome characters
Awesome gameplay
Download Slime Farmer: War of Rancher and play now!
